So I told myself I wasn't going to read the comments, but here I am weighing in on the issue. Furthermore, I know I am gonna write a book about it, so bear with me.

Guys, take this with a grain of salt, from doing way more than my fair share of watching videos like this and reading comments such as these size matters. Girls (much like yourself) have preferences. So perhaps bigger isn't always better, but I strongly doubt that the average 6" is ideal. The "ideal" size obviously depends on the girl, but my guess is that most girls would say something like 7 to 7.5 inches. Before you go around calling them sluts because average isn't there ideal size, realize two things:
1. You have preferences too, and chances are you prefer women who are a little bit above "average" physically.
2. This is just their ideal size (holding everything else about a man as a constant). It doesn't mean that they would not like a man based on the size of his dick, or that they would like a deuch bag with their ideal size.

In fact their preferences probably change sometimes week to week or month to month. I know I sometimes have little fetishes about women with larger breasts and sometimes I want to think about a woman with average breasts.... sometimes smaller than average. A girl can be hot regardless of her breast size, and you can be attractive regardless of your penis size. Stop trying to think of it as being subpar, and try to realize that you really just fit in somewhere in the bigger picture.

Because I think that at any given moment there are a couple dozen high school guys reading over this page, trying to measure there dick down to the planck length and stressing out over whether or not they are average, I'm gonna tell you two things to try to help ease your mind:
1. You've measured your dick 10 times today and have read countless internet blogs to try to see if you are the 49th or 51st percentile and you still don't have any clue which one it is. I can guarantee that a girl who sees your dick once or twice isn't gonna put that much effort into figuring out which side of average you are on.
2, When I was in high school, I had this perception that all women are bitches. Sure, some girls are (and I don't really want anything to do with the ones who are anyway), but I only believed this to be true because I was too shy to talk to them, and thought that this meant that I was unwanted. Now that I am in university and have grown a pair of balls, I've talked to some (albeit not about penis size) and I really couldn't see any of them bashing on a guy because his dick was small.

But what if I really like this girl and I think she is fuck buddies with someone? What if he's bigger than me?
1. If she does like you in return (as in wants to date you), she will probably get over the fact that he is bigger than you and be more than happy with your size.
2. If she doesn't want to date you it's probably regardless of your penis size. So assuming she's down to be friends with benefits she probably doesn't really think about who is bigger and who is smaller. She probably just tries to enjoy sex with both of you. She won't think of you as less of a man not will she not want to be friends with you anymore because he happens to be bigger than you.

Another great episode guys.I have just one note about what you said about the peacocks.A controversial study has found no evidence for the traditional view – practically enshrined in evolutionary lore – that peahens choose their partners depending on the quality of the peacocks' tails. Mariko Takahashi and Toshikazu Hasegawa at the University of Tokyo in Japan studied peacocks and peahens in Izu Cactus Park, Shizuoka, from 1995 to 2001. They judged tail quality in two ways – first by simply measuring tail length, and secondly by taking photos of each male during the tail-fanning display ritual and counting the number of eyespots. Next they examined whether females chose mates with the best-quality tails. During the seven years of observation, Takahashi's team observed 268 successful matings. But surprisingly, they found that females mated with poor-quality peacocks as often as with "flashy", high-quality males.
They conclude that the peacock's train is not the object of female sexual preference – contradicting Darwin's theory of sexual selection. Takahashi points out that growth of the peacock's train is dependent on the absence of oestrogen rather than the presence of testosterone. She says this undermines the assumption that the train is a sexual signal.

Side notes the the info in the video:
>Biggest penis in primates
Sexual selection is just one possible explanation for this phenomenon. It probably (also) has to do with us walking upright an therefore changing some of the mechanics involved.
>Vaginal orgasms
Vaginal orgasms are extremely rare to non-existent for most women. This has less to do with the penis involved but more the anatomy of the female genitalia. Sexual arousal for women is mostly based on the situation (psychological) and achieving an orgasm without physical contact is "easier" for women while male arousal can be (and mostly is) based on physical stimuli. Reported vaginal orgasms are most likely (at least partially) to be attributed to this phenomenon.
>Attractiveness of flaccid penises
They forgot to mention that there were multiple physical variables in this study. Penis size was not a factor until the body was otherwise considered attractive. It didn't make a difference in less attractive/unattractive bodies.

Generally research says this: There is an aesthetic preference (to a certain degree) but it isn't a very important one, compared to other physical and especially social/mental attributes.
